focus: Monitoring table styling improvements - actions column with icon, gradient, sticky positioning
notes: COMPLETED: (1) Loading indicators working - checkingStatus field added to query, (2) Previous positions filled - using second-most-recent position logic, (3) Badge styling - blue/gray for positions, green/red with arrows for changes, (4) URL display - single line with ellipsis and tooltip, (5) Actions menu - dropdown with view/edit/refresh/delete per row, (6) Actions column - sticky to right with Key01 icon header, gradient ::before effect, custom styling (#f8f8f8 bg, centered, 8px font, border-left). All tested with Playwright.
